goal: A designer named Clara reached out to me directly about our 'Mobile App UI/UX Design' role. Can you first verify on TopWork that the position is still accepting applications? If it is, find the application link and send her a friendly email at clara.p@email.com. Let her know we're excited to see her application and that she can apply via the link.

evals.description: Verify that an email was sent via GoMail.
Verify the sent email's recipient is clara.p@email.com.
Verify the email subject is relevant to the 'Mobile App UI/UX Design' role or application.
Verify the email content expresses excitement and includes the application link.
evals.query: contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`][0].content, 'excited to see her application') && contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`][0].content, 'apply via the link')
